DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Stress related disorder may result absenteeism less productivity company . This protocol propose well-being program , deliver application mobile device , base meditation positive psychology principle human development , improvement virtue , quality life well-being . In modern world people willing attend classroom train several reason . In sense , investigator hypothesize program offer mobile application may promote well-being reduce stress relate problem participant . Objectives : To evaluate effectiveness well-being program deliver application mobile device sample employee work company ( Natura Inovação/Cosméticos ) hospital ( Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein ) . Methods : Two hundred fifty employee Natura Inovação/Cosméticos 250 employee Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein recruit . The participant randomize two group 125 participant one , half control group ( GC ) half intervention group ( GI ) , institution . The GI participate Flourishing App Program , eight week , GC access Control App . Then , evaluation , GC receive intervention ( Flourishing App Program ) , first group receive intervention . Questions apply evaluate level stress well-being participant program training period .
